APIKey.name: APIKey
APIKey.description: APIKey represents an API key for programmatic access

fields.name: Key
fields.description: Transient field - only populated during creation

AuthorizationCode.name: AuthorizationCode
AuthorizationCode.description: AuthorizationCode represents an OAuth2/OIDC authorization code

Delivery.name: Delivery
Delivery.description: Delivery represents a webhook delivery attempt

EmailOTP.name: EmailOTP
EmailOTP.description: EmailOTP stores OTP codes for email-based authentication

Invitation.name: Invitation
Invitation.description: Invitation represents the organization invitation table

JWTKey.name: JWTKey
JWTKey.description: JWTKey represents a JWT signing key

Member.name: Member
Member.description: Member represents the organization member table

Notification.name: Notification
Notification.description: Notification represents a notification instance in the database

NotificationTemplate.name: NotificationTemplate
NotificationTemplate.description: NotificationTemplate represents a notification template in the database

OAuthToken.name: OAuthToken
OAuthToken.description: OAuthToken represents an OAuth2/OIDC access token

OTPCode.name: OTPCode
OTPCode.description: OTPCode stores one-time codes for OTP-based 2FA

SSOProvider.name: SSOProvider
SSOProvider.description: SSOProvider stores per-organization SSO provider configuration

fields.name: SAMLEntryPoint
fields.description: SAML config (basic fields; extend as needed)

fields.name: OIDCClientID
fields.description: OIDC config (basic fields; extend as needed)

SocialAccount.name: SocialAccount
SocialAccount.description: SocialAccount links a user to an OAuth provider account

TrustedDevice.name: TrustedDevice
TrustedDevice.description: TrustedDevice allows skipping 2FA for a period

UserBan.name: UserBan
UserBan.description: UserBan represents a user ban record in the database

UserRole.name: UserRole
UserRole.description: UserRole maps users to roles within an organization
